head.citation-title: A new kind of convolution, correlation and product theorems related to quaternion linear canonical transform
head.abstracts: Â© 2020, Springer-Verlag London Ltd., part of Springer Nature.The quaternion linear canonical transform (QLCT) has been investigated and used for many years by various research communities; it has been shown to be a powerful tool for signal processing. In this paper, a novel canonical convolution operator and a related correlation operator for QLCT are proposed. Moreover, based on the proposed operators, the corresponding generalized convolution, correlation and product theorems are studied.

coredata.dc:description: The quaternion linear canonical transform (QLCT) has been investigated and used for many years by various research communities; it has been shown to be a powerful tool for signal processing. In this paper, a novel canonical convolution operator and a related correlation operator for QLCT are proposed. Moreover, based on the proposed operators, the corresponding generalized convolution, correlation and product theorems are studied.
